metadata.name: Golden Token: City 9 1/999
metadata.description:
**[CryptoCitizens](https://opensea.io/collection/cryptocitizensofficial) | [Roadmap](https://www.brightmoments.io/) | [Discord](https://discord.gg/brightmoments)**

A Golden Token City 9 (GTC9) NFT provides the holder with a claim to mint 1 of 1,000 City 9 CryptoCitizen NFTs through an IRL-only mint experience. City 9 will be in South America (i.e Rio, Buenos Aires, or Bogota) in Fall 2023 and voted on by CryptoCitizen holders in Spring 2023.
